Content:
Have you ever been in love before 
Yes I have  before
No I haven't  before
Fallen in love
Experienced heartbreak
Had a crush

How was the experience
It was 
A wonderful experience
Bittersweet
Not my interest

What do you look for in a partner
I look for 
Good sense of humor
Honesty
Similar interests

How often do you see a person like that
Actually I  see a person like that
Rarely
Never
Usually

How will you find a person with that quality
I think I will  to find my ideal partner
Try to meet new people
Use online dating apps
Go on a date

What would you do if your partner is not like that
I would  in that situation
Accept their personalities
Break up the relationship
Seek advicefrom a friend

Do you often have a crush on someone
I  have a crush on someone
Hardly ever
Seldom
Often

What do you do when you have a crush
In this situation I often 
Distract myself with my hobby
Leave it to fate
Talk to friends

How does that help you
It helps me to 
Maintain a positive outlook
Make sure about my feeling
Fell less alone

Should I tell my crush how I feel
I think it is 
Worth takibg the risk
A personal decision
Not necessary

How should I do that
You should 
Be honest with feelings
Take chance
Consider the timing

How do I know if someone likes me back
If someone likes you back they might 
Shoe interest in your hobbies
Call you often
Be open with you

Have you tried any dating apps before
Well I have  before
Not tried any dating apps
Tried a few dating apps
Seen my friends using dating apps

Are you looking for something serious or just casual dating
I am looking for 
A long-term commitment
Something non-specific
A soulmate

How do you usually start a conversation with your match
I usually start a conversation by 
Complimenting something about them
Making a lighthearted joke
Commenting on a shared experience

How do they generally respond
They seem to 
Show interest
Be overwhelmed
React with surprise

Can you share some tips for online dating
It is crucial to be 
Open-minded to differences
Mindful all the time
Firm with your boundaries

What are some common mistakes people make with online dating in your opinion
People tend to 
Focus solely on physical apprearance
Share too much personal information too soon
Fall for scams

How do you handle rejection when it comes to dating
I will keep 
A strong sense of self-worth
More realistic expectations
Faith in other relationships

What makes you decide to call it off
I think this will not work out because of
Incomtible lifestyles 
Unresolved conflicts 
Emotional neglect

How does it affect our relationship
It has become to keep our relationship going 
More challenging than ever
Emotionally draining
Quite painful

Was the long distance too hard for you
The distance is 
Drifting us apart 
Not the underlying reason 
Just one of many factors

Is there anything we can do differently
I believe that ending our relationship is 
A part of growing up 
A fresh start for both of us
The last straw for us

Do you think we can still be friends
I think it is 
Better to avoid each other for a while 
Possible to be friends 
Hard to tell

Why do you feel that way
We need to 
Heal our broken hearts 
Cherish the good times we had 
Focus on ourselves

Do you have any last words
Thank you for being a part of my life and I wish you
Happiness in the future 
The best of luck in every aspect of your life 
Peace of mind to move on

Who should take the first move in love
In my opinion should be proactive in love 
The person who feels strongly 
Both partners 
The man

What is your thinking behind that
It is important to  
Speak up your emotions 
Have mutual contribution
Consider the role in a romantic relatuonship

What if both like each other but neither takes the initative
If this scenario happens it can create 
A real headache
A awkward situation
A whole lot of drama

What should we do in that situation
In such a situation it is necessary to 
Gather up the courage to talk it out 
Ask the other person out on a date 
Make a gesture of affection

Is it always neccessary to take the lead in love
Itto take the lead in love 
Might be a must 
May not be required 
Should not have  rules

In which situations is being proactive in love unnecessary
Being proactive may be unnecessary in situations where
Your partner needs private times 
Your partner wants to take the lead
You run out of energy for giving things one way
